description: Very good for messing around, and also does a good job when you actually need new noises and are not feeling very creative. Looks terrible though!

This is a great little sound creation program and I highly recommend it, its fantastic. 
The only issue I have is this Linux version seems to have some text scaling issues, so it really hard to read the test, as shown in the screen-shot. 
If this is a stylistic choice by the developer, that's okay, but a normal text mode or something to up the scale and clarity would be greatly appreciated. 

This program is great for those looking to make quirky and simple sounds for a game, website or program, or possibly even a sound pack for Gnome/other desktop environments. 

It even has pre-sets for things like 'Jump' and 'item pick up' which is very nice for those looking for simple 'one click' solutions for creating their own sounds for their mini game.

Got to the love the little simple programs like this!
Would like to be able to resize it.
Basic but you wont need more.
summary: Basic but you wont need more

description: Great for make sounds in menu's of for ur mobile phone.
summary: Very nice and to the point
